titleStmt.title: Fishermen fishers of men A sermon preached at Mercers Chapell on Mid-Lent Sunday the 26. of March 1609. By Iohn Ravvlinson Doctour of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Rawlinson, John, 1576-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Arnold Hatfield for Edward Blount and William Barret,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
